text: Santiago Guarderas Izquierdo (born 1962) is an Ecuadorian politician and lawyer. For a few months in 2007, he was a member of the National Congress. He is a member of Movimiento Unión Ecuatoriana. Before, he was part of the Social Christian Party. In 2021, Guarderas became Mayor of Quito after being Vice Mayor between 2019 until 2021.Santiago Guarderas y Gissela Chalá son los vicepresidentes del Concejo Metropolitano de Quito Corte Constitucional falla en contra de Jorge Yunda y lo deja sin la Alcaldía ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Quito Category:Ecuadorian lawyers
title: Santiago Guarderas
